channel.title: Supply Chain, Security on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Supply Chain, Security on Open Security Summit

item.title: Dependency Management and Supply Chain Security
item.description: Session slides About this session Modern software has dependencies – lots of dependencies, especially when including the transitive ones. Most of these dependencies are open source packages downloaded from a public software repository. Any of those dependencies may have vulnerabilities, include a supply-chain attack or use unwanted licenses. All this may change with any version. That’s why actively managing dependencies should be one of the focus areas of software development.
